channel.title: What happen with my java? (Really need help)
channel.description:
Hello! like 5 days ago i start with this of runescape servers...
So i install the last version, of the Java the JDK 6 Update 20
So already is done, i download the moparscape and a source (in my case the testscape).
i made Some changes to the .java files and when i try to compile i got some errors (here come the hell)
So.. i edit the compile.bat like 500 times now i got this:
Compile.bat [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
All in this code are good ALL!
But the error continues and i can't compile.
The error (Holy shit with that) [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Presione una tecla para continuar . . .[/code]
I think that my error is because mi java... i install it with no problems with it says that any happen with the "main" thread... i don0t knwo anything of that so any can help me?

item.title: What happen with my java? (Really need help)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

who needs a tutorial to write 2 lines?
just set your classpath variable to this:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and your path variable to this:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin;

Read full topic
item.source: What happen with my java? (Really need help)

item.title: What happen with my java? (Really need help)
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

usman555:

did u set your environmental variables?

Yeah i set it… but i think that i set it bad you can tell me how to set it? (to correct it if i have some bad)

[quote=“n10si t, post:3, topic:344343”]Re download java, and make sure you get it into C:\Program Files\Java

And set your paths.[/quote]

Okay it will take me a few minutes…

Set my paths? is the environmental variables? my respond is same to usman555

item.title: What happen with my java? (Really need help)
item.dc:creator: @raiden123 raiden123
item.description:
@raiden123 wrote:

Hello! like 5 days ago i start with this of runescape servers…

So i install the last version, of the Java the JDK 6 Update 20

So already is done, i download the moparscape and a source (in my case the testscape).

i made Some changes to the .java files and when i try to compile i got some errors (here come the hell)

So… i edit the compile.bat like 500 times now i got this:

Compile.bat

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

All in this code are good ALL!

But the error continues and i can’t compile.

The error (Holy shit with that)

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Presione una tecla para continuar . . .

I think that my error is because mi java… i install it with no problems with it says that any happen with the “main” thread… i don0t knwo anything of that so any can help me?
